text: Yang Junxia (born 2 May 1989) is a Chinese judoka who competes in the 63 kg division. She won a silver medal at the 2014 Asian Games and was eliminated in the repechage at the 2016 Olympics. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female judoka Category:Olympic judoka of China Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in judo Category:Judoka at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for China Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games
title: Yang Junxia
